  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    ALLCAP
    Font contains no lowercase letters.
    static final int
    FIXED_PITCH
    All glyphs have the same width.
    static final int
    FORCEBOLD
    Determines whether bold glyphs shall be painted with extra pixels even at very small text sizes.
    static final int
    ITALIC
    Glyphs have dominant vertical strokes that are slanted.
    static final int
    NONSYMBOLIC
    Font uses the Adobe standard Latic character set.
    static final int
    SCRIPT
    Glyphs resemble cursive handwriting.
    static final int
    SERIF
    Glyphs have serifs.
    static final int
    SMALLCAP
    Font contains both uppercase and lowercase letters..
    static final int
    SYMBOLIC
    Font contains glyphs outside the Adobe standard Latin.
